title: The 2 Most Dramatic Moments Of The US Election 2024
content: US voters will either pick their first female, Black and Asian leader - or reappoint a chief executive seeking an unprecedented return to the White House he left in disgrace nearly four years ago.
summary: US voters will either pick their first female, Black and Asian leader - or reappoint a chief executive seeking an unprecedented return to the White House he left in disgrace nearly four years ago.

title: Cleaning Up Pristine Beaches Means Spotting Plastic Trash From Space
content: Plastics are ubiquitous in natural systems, and tiny pieces of the material have been found everywhere from the Arctic to the Mariana Trench.

title: Biden Bites Baby: A Last Week Of US Election Oddities

title: Video: Canada Cops Assault Hindu Devotees During Protest Over Temple Attack
content: Canadian cops clashed with Hindu devotees protesting an attack on a temple near Toronto by "anti-India elements". The cops assaulted protesters, many of whom were waving the Indian flag, showed a video shared by a Canadian journalist.
summary: Canadian cops clashed with Hindu devotees protesting an attack on a temple near Toronto by "anti-India elements". The cops assaulted protesters, many of whom were waving the Indian flag, showed a video shared by a Canadian journalist.

title: "All In Good Health": Chinese Space Station Crew Returns After Six Months
content: A three-person Chinese crew returned to Earth early Monday after more than six months aboard the Tiangong space station.
summary: A three-person Chinese crew returned to Earth early Monday after more than six months aboard the Tiangong space station.

title: US Election 2024: Kamala Harris And Donald Trump Embark On Final Campaign
content: Bitter rivals Kamala Harris and Donald Trump embark on a final frenzied campaign blitz Monday with both hitting must-win Pennsylvania on the last day of the tightest and most volatile US presidential election in memory.

title: 8 New Defendants To Take Stand As France Mass Rape Trial Resumes
content: The trial of a Frenchman who recruited dozens of strangers to rape his drugged wife at their home resumes on Monday, with the cases of eight new defendants to be examined in court.
summary: The trial of a Frenchman who recruited dozens of strangers to rape his drugged wife at their home resumes on Monday, with the cases of eight new defendants to be examined in court.

title: Austria's Alpine Refuges And Trails Crumble As Climate Warms
content: Experts say warmer temperatures across the Alps are accelerating glacier melt and thawing permafrost, the year-round ice that binds together giant slabs of rock.
summary: Experts say warmer temperatures across the Alps are accelerating glacier melt and thawing permafrost, the year-round ice that binds together giant slabs of rock.

title: Opinion: India To Africa, Calls For Britain To Pay Reparations Are Growing

title: Two Days After Iranian Woman's Arrest For Stripping, Her Whereabouts Unknown

title: How A DNA Test Revealed Two Women Were Swapped At Birth

title: Not Just Carbon Dioxide, Other Greenhouse Gases Are Too Warming The Planet
content: While carbon dioxide (CO2) is the best-known greenhouse gas, several others, including methane and nitrous oxide, are also driving global warming and altering the Earth's climate.
